about_the_game:
Have you ever dreamed of finding a good company for tabletop role-playing games? Of creating a party of brave and reckless girls who defeat their rivals with the power of love and lust? Of seducing a dragon instead of fighting? EmyLiveShow: Dragon & Mistresses Tale can make those dreams come true!

Dive into the lore of the fantasy world and guide three adventurers through it. Fight monsters, romance charming strangers, find powerful artifacts. Save the world and don't forget to thank your game master at the end of the session!

EmyLiveShow: Dragon & Mistresses Tale is a tabletop role-playing game themed erotic visual novel using dice rolling mechanics.

Follow two parallel storylines. The girls at the table discuss the events, bicker, and try to get spoilers from the game master as they role-play. Help them to complete their quest peacefully or violently!

Test your luck. Dice rolls will determine the outcome of your actions, but the story will continue anyway. Sometimes it's more fun to fail than to succeed!

Arm your adventurers. The right equipment can help when the dice aren't on your side. But look carefully, some of these artifacts are cursed...

Enjoy a variety of hot scenes for all tastes. Don't forget the little pleasures, even when the world is in danger. Original EmyLiveShow voice actors narrate all illustrated scenes!

Get to know Emy, Nia, Uma and Six better! The EmyLiveShow Vtube project has grown since the S&M Story – meet new hentai hostesses, check out the development of the old-timers and discover how they have fun and spend their free time together!

The game reveals the topics of: LGBTQ+ friendly, mistress, BDSM, pet play, threesome, group sex‎, kink, masochism, sadism, sadomasochism, dominant, submissive, bondage, male dominance/maledom, male submission, female dominance/femdom, female submission, dominatrix, rough sex, masturbation, voyeurism, sexual roles‎, sex toys, oral sex, vaginal sex, anal sex, foot fetish, tentacle sex, futanari, erotic massage, erotic dances.

highlighted.name: Every adventure starts in a tavern
Your king is in another chamber

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains materials that are not suitable for all ages, not suitable for viewing at work: hentai, profanity, scenes of a sexual nature, partial and complete nudity, third-person sex scenes, scenes and discussions of various types of sex.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Catalina 10.15.3
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz Quad-Core Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11

  • Processor: 2.3 GHz Quad-Core Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated

  • Sound Card: DirectX 11

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Win 7 or higher 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3 Gen or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 7400M, NVIDIA GeForce GT620M (min 2 Gb)
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4 Gen or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce gtx 550 (min 2 Gb)
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated

short_description: Join four hot Vtuber girls on a kinky fantasy role-playing adventure. Roll the dice and break hearts in the new EmyLiveShow hentai visual novel!
